name: Ginseng King
summary:
My boss hates me... my co-workers don’t recognize me… and ! 
Always carrying resignation letter, my health is getting worse... 
 
I need some remedy food!!!!!!!! 
 
Ginseng! How many did you try?!!!! 
 
Special Ginsengs are waiting for you..?! 
Move one nutrient in a puzzle to get many combo as possible! 
 
My precious Ginseng, how old can you grow? 
 
▶ Say bye to good old puzzles~ 
Spiderweb, Ice, Rotten nutrients will hinder ginseng’s growth…! 
Get rid of them for your precious Ginsengs!! 
 
▶ HI, is this your first Ginseng? 
Ginsengs out of this world!!! 
Once you’ve taste it, you can’t get out it! 
 
▶ Play Ginseng King when you are tired~! 
Funny and cheerful ginsengs will bring you happiness!
